request.description:
https://forge.autodesk.com/en/docs/bim360/v1/reference/http/mc-modelset-service-v3-create-model-set-POST/

Create a Model Set within a given Container specifying the Folder which will be used to determine the set of Model Document lineages comprising the Model Set.


1. get a folder urn from other APIs of Data Managemen firstly, and input it as body param [folderUrn]. Ensure this user has write permissions of the folder
2. provide the custom name [name] of the new modelset
3. after posting, a job will be starting. The job id will be set to [jobId]. Check the status by the other endpoint [GET jobs/:jobId]

https://forge.autodesk.com/en/docs/bim360/v1/reference/http/mc-modelset-service-v3-get-model-sets-GET/

Gets a list of model sets in a given container which match the provided search parameters. In default, non-active modelset will bt ignored. The param [includeDisabled] can tell whether or not to include disabled model sets.


The first modelset ID will be set to [modelSetId] for other endpoints use. Manually change to the id of other modelset if needed.

https://forge.autodesk.com/en/docs/bim360/v1/reference/http/mc-modelset-service-v3-get-container-job-by-container-GET/

Retrieves information about a given container job.

The current job status. Possible values: Failed, Running, Succeeded, Archived

https://forge.autodesk.com/en/docs/bim360/v1/reference/http/mc-modelset-service-v3-get-model-set-GET/

Gets a requested model set based on the model set’s ID.

https://forge.autodesk.com/en/docs/bim360/v1/reference/http/mc-modelset-service-v3-patch-model-set-name-description-PATCH/

Updates a given model set’s name and/or description.

If oldName and newName are supplied, the name will be updated (both must be supplied, the name cannot be null)
If oldDescription or newDescription is supplied, the description will be updated (one can be null or omitted, description can be set to null)

https://forge.autodesk.com/en/docs/bim360/v1/reference/http/mc-modelset-service-v3-add-model-set-issue-POST/

Adds a model set visual inspection issue, represented as a BIM360 issue.

1. Firstly, by [Model Set] >> [GET modelsets/:modelSetId/versions/latest] OR [Model Set] >> [GET modelsets/:modelSetId/versions/:version], get the version URN of the models. Select one as the input of documentVersionUrn

2. Secondly, by [Model Set] >> [POST modelsets/:modelSetId/screenshots], create one screenshot for this issue.

3. By Pushpin tutorial ( https://forge.autodesk.com/en/docs/bim360/v1/tutorials/pushpins/), get valid location and objectId for pushpin.
After posting, a job will be starting. The job id will be set to [jobId]. Check the status by the other endpoint [Model Set]>>[GET modelsets/:modelSetId/jobs/:jobId]

https://forge.autodesk.com/en/docs/bim360/v1/reference/http/mc-modelset-service-v3-get-model-set-job-GET/

Retrieves information about a given model set job.

https://forge.autodesk.com/en/docs/bim360/v1/reference/http/mc-modelset-service-v3-add-screen-shot-POST/

1. select a local file to upload. 
2. Note: when uploading a screenshot, it creates a "temporary" screenshot ID, which expires after 30 days - attaching it to a resource takes the temporary screenshot and makes a "persistent" screenshot with a new ID, which is then returned with the resource. So temp screenshot cannot be got by [GET modelsets/:modelSetId/screenshots/:screenShotId].
3. The temp id will be set to [screenshot_id].

https://forge.autodesk.com/en/docs/bim360/v1/reference/http/mc-modelset-service-v3-get-screen-shot-GET/

Gets a specific screenshot based on the screenshot’s ID.


NOTE!! Newly uploaded screenshots can be retrieved with this endpoint and must first be associated with a resource.

https://forge.autodesk.com/en/docs/bim360/v1/reference/http/mc-modelset-service-v3-create-model-set-version-POST/

Requests that the Model Coordination system creates a new version of a given model set.

Note that this operation is not guaranteed to result in a new version of the model set being generated. If the folder contents have not changed, or the change does not necessitate a new model set version (e.g. the changed models are not valid for use in Model Coordination) then no new model set version will be created.

After posting, a job will be starting. The job id will be set to [jobId]. Check the status by the other endpoint [Model Set]>>[GET modelsets/:modelSetId/jobs/:jobId]

https://forge.autodesk.com/en/docs/bim360/v1/reference/http/mc-modelset-service-v3-get-model-set-versions-GET/

Gets a list of versions of a given model set.

The first modelset version id will be set to [version] for other endpoints use. Manually change to the id of other modelset version if needed.

https://forge.autodesk.com/en/docs/bim360/v1/reference/http/mc-modelset-service-v3-get-model-set-version-latest-GET/

Gets the latest version of a given model set based on the model set’s ID.

The  latest modelset version id will be set to [version] for other endpoints use.

https://forge.autodesk.com/en/docs/bim360/v1/reference/http/mc-modelset-service-v3-get-model-set-version-GET/
 
 Gets a specific version of a given model set based on the model set’s ID and the version number.

https://forge.autodesk.com/en/docs/bim360/v1/reference/http/mc-modelset-service-v3-enable-model-set-versions-PATCH/

Enables automatic version creation for a given model set.  After posting, a job will be starting. The job id will be set to [jobId]. Check the status by the other endpoint [Model Set]>>[GET modelsets/:modelSetId/jobs/:jobId]

If enabled, model set version creation will be triggered when the model set’s folders’ content changes, or if a call is explicitly made to the ‘Create Model Set Version’ endpoint.
If enabled, model set version creation will be triggered when the model set’s folders’ content changes, or if a call is explicitly made to the ‘Create Model Set Version’ endpoint. If disabled, only an explicit call to the ‘Create Model Set Version’ endpoint will trigger new version creation.

https://forge.autodesk.com/en/docs/bim360/v1/reference/http/mc-modelset-service-v3-disable-model-set-versions-PATCH/

Disables automatic version creation for a given model set. After posting, a job will be starting. The job id will be set to [jobId]. Check the status by the other endpoint [Model Set]>>[GET modelsets/:modelSetId/jobs/:jobId]



If enabled, model set version creation will be triggered when the model set’s folders’ content changes, or if a call is explicitly made to the ‘Create Model Set Version’ endpoint. If disabled, only an explicit call to the ‘Create Model Set Version’ endpoint will trigger new version creation.

The response contains information about the created model set job.

https://forge.autodesk.com/en/docs/bim360/v1/reference/http/mc-modelset-service-v3-create-model-set-view-POST/

Adds a view to a given model set. A view consists of a chosen set of distinct model document lineages which exist within a single model set. The ID of a newly uploaded screenshot can also be supplied, which will associate the screenshot with the newly created view.

1. Firstly, by [Model Set] >> [GET modelsets/:modelSetId/versions/latest]  OR [Model Set] >> [GET modelsets/:modelSetId/versions/:version], get the lineage URN of the models.
2. Secondly, by [Model Set] >> [POST modelsets/:modelSetId/screenshots], create one screenshot for this view.
3. After posting, a job will be starting. The job id will be set to [jobId]. Check the status by the other endpoint [Model Set]>>[GET modelsets/:modelSetId/jobs/:jobId]

https://forge.autodesk.com/en/docs/bim360/v1/reference/http/mc-modelset-service-v3-get-model-set-views-GET/

Gets a list of model set views in a given model set which match the provided search parameters. The first view  id will be set to [viewId] for other endpoints use. Manually change to the id of other view  if needed.

https://forge.autodesk.com/en/docs/bim360/v1/reference/http/mc-modelset-service-v3-search-model-set-view-lineages-POST/

Gets a list of model set views in a given model set which contain the provided set of document lineage URNs. To match the provided list exactly, set the exact property to true.

https://forge.autodesk.com/en/docs/bim360/v1/reference/http/mc-modelset-service-v3-get-model-set-view-GET/

Gets a specific model set view based on the view’s ID.

https://forge.autodesk.com/en/docs/bim360/v1/reference/http/mc-modelset-service-v3-update-model-set-view-PATCH/

Updates a specific model set view.After posting, a job will be starting. The job id will be set to [jobId]. Check the status by the other endpoint [Model Set]>>[GET modelsets/:modelSetId/jobs/:jobId]


If oldName and newName are supplied, the name will be updated (both must be supplied, the name cannot be null)
If oldDescription or newDescription is supplied, the description will be updated (one can be null or omitted, description can be set to null)
If oldIsPrivate and newIsPrivate are supplied, the privacy of the view will be updated (both must be supplied)
If oldDefinition and newDefinition are supplied, the view definition will be updated (both must be supplied)

https://forge.autodesk.com/en/docs/bim360/v1/reference/http/mc-modelset-service-v3-delete-model-set-view-DELETE/

Deletes a specific model set view based on the view’s ID. After posting, a job will be starting. The job id will be set to [jobId]. Check the status by the other endpoint [Model Set]>>[GET modelsets/:modelSetId/jobs/:jobId]

https://forge.autodesk.com/en/docs/bim360/v1/reference/http/mc-modelset-service-v3-get-model-set-view-versions-GET/

Gets a list of all model set views in a given model set as they exist in a specific model set version. The first version view id will be set to [viewId] for other endpoints use. Manually change to the id of other  version view if needed.

https://forge.autodesk.com/en/docs/bim360/v1/reference/http/mc-modelset-service-v3-get-model-set-view-version-GET/

Gets a model set view as it exists in a specific model set version.

This operation determines which specific versions of the document lineages contained in the given view are present in the given model set version.

https://forge.autodesk.com/en/docs/bim360/v1/reference/http/mc-modelset-service-v3-get-model-set-view-job-GET/

Retrieves information about a given model set view job.

https://forge.autodesk.com/en/docs/bim360/v1/reference/http/mc-clash-service-v3-get-model-set-clash-tests-GET/

Gets a list of summaries for all clash tests which have been executed for a given model set.  
The first test id is set to [test_id] for other endpoints use. Change the id of other test if needed.

https://forge.autodesk.com/en/docs/bim360/v1/reference/http/mc-clash-service-v3-get-model-set-version-clash-tests-GET/

Gets a list of summaries for all clash tests which have been executed for a given model set version. If no tests have yet been completed for the specified model set version then no tests will returned. 
The first test id is set to [test_id] for other endpoints use. Change the id of other test if needed.

https://forge.autodesk.com/en/docs/bim360/v1/reference/http/mc-clash-service-v3-get-clash-test-GET/

Gets a requested clash test based on the clash test’s ID.

https://forge.autodesk.com/en/docs/bim360/v1/reference/http/mc-clash-service-v3-get-clash-test-resources-GET/

Gets information about a given clash test’s result resources.
click url to open another tab of endpoint, click [Send] to download the contents of the file. large file, better download as file

https://forge.autodesk.com/en/docs/bim360/v1/reference/http/mc-clash-service-v3-add-closed-clash-group-batch-POST/

Adds a batch of new closed clash groups to the given clash test.

Clash groups which are closed will not be presented should they occur in subsequent clash tests. The clash will still be present in the model however it is not deemed necessary to remove it.

https://forge.autodesk.com/en/docs/bim360/v1/reference/http/mc-clash-service-v3-get-clash-test-closed-clash-group-intersection-GET/

Gets the state of all closed clash groups in a particular model set, relative to a specified clash test.

This endpoint takes the clashes contained within each closed clash group stored in the system for all clash tests on the same model set, and intersects them with the results of the specified clash test. Clashes which were present when the clash group was first defined may now be resolved.

https://forge.autodesk.com/en/docs/bim360/v1/reference/http/mc-clash-service-v3-get-closed-clash-group-data-batch-POST/

Gets the state of the specified closed clash groups, relative to a specified clash test.

This endpoint takes the clashes contained within each specified closed clash group, and intersects them with the results of the specified clash test. Clashes which were present when the clash group was first defined may now be resolved.

Input clash group id as the param

https://forge.autodesk.com/en/docs/bim360/v1/reference/http/mc-clash-service-v3-reopen-closed-clash-group-batch-POST/

Re-opens a batch of existing closed clash groups.

This endpoint essentially deletes the specified closed clash groups. This operation cannot be undone, but the closed clash groups can be recreated identically if necessary.

https://forge.autodesk.com/en/docs/bim360/v1/reference/http/mc-clash-service-v3-search-container-model-set-closed-clash-groups-GET/

Gets a list of closed clash groups in a given model set which match the provided search parameters.

https://forge.autodesk.com/en/docs/bim360/v1/reference/http/mc-clash-service-v3-add-assigned-clash-group-batch-POST/

Adds a batch of new assigned clash groups to the given clash test.Clash groups which need resolving via a design change are stored as assigned clash groups. In addition a BIM 360 issue is created and associated with the assigned clash group.

1. Firstly, by [Model Set] >> [GET modelsets/:modelSetId/versions/latest] OR [Model Set] >> [GET modelsets/:modelSetId/versions/:version], get the lineage URN of the models. Select one as the input of documentVersionUrn
2.Secondly, by [Model Set] >> [POST modelsets/:modelSetId/screenshots], create one screenshot for this issue.
3. By Pushpin tutorial ( https://forge.autodesk.com/en/docs/bim360/v1/tutorials/pushpins/), get valid location and objectId for pushpin.
4. After posting, a job will be starting. The job id will be set to [jobId]. Check the status by the other endpoint [Clash Test: Clash Groups Shared]>>[GET clashes/jobs/:jobId]

https://forge.autodesk.com/en/docs/bim360/v1/reference/http/mc-clash-service-v3-get-clash-test-assigned-clash-group-intersection-GET/

Gets the state of all assigned clash groups in a particular model set, relative to a specified clash test.

This endpoint takes the clashes contained within each assigned clash group stored in the system for all clash tests on the same model set, and intersects them with the results of the specified clash test. Clashes which were present when the clash group was first defined may now be resolved.

https://forge.autodesk.com/en/docs/bim360/v1/reference/http/mc-clash-service-v3-get-assigned-clash-group-batch-POST/

This endpoint takes the clashes contained within each specified assigned clash group, and intersects them with the results of the specified clash test. Clashes which were present when the clash group was first defined may now be resolved. 
This method can accept either a list of assigned clash group IDs or a list of BIM 360 Issue service Issue GUIDs. To retrieve results by BIM 360 Issue GUID, set the issues query parameter to true.

https://forge.autodesk.com/en/docs/bim360/v1/reference/http/mc-clash-service-v3-search-container-issue-clash-groups-GET/

Gets a list of assigned clash groups in a given model set which match the provided search parameters.

https://forge.autodesk.com/en/docs/bim360/v1/reference/http/mc-clash-service-v3-get-clash-group-job-GET/

Retrieves information about a given clash job.

https://forge.autodesk.com/en/docs/bim360/v1/reference/http/mc-clash-service-v3-add-screen-shot-POST/

Uploads a screenshot, associating it with a given model set.  

1. select a local file to upload. 
2. Note: when uploading a screenshot, it creates a "temporary" screenshot ID, which expires after 30 days - attaching it to a resource takes the temporary screenshot and makes a "persistent" screenshot with a new ID, which is then returned with the resource. So temp screenshot cannot be got by [GET modelsets/:modelSetId/screenshots/:screenShotId].
3. The temp id will be set to [screenshot_id].

https://forge.autodesk.com/en/docs/bim360/v1/reference/http/mc-clash-service-v3-get-screen-shot-GET/

Gets a specific screenshot based on the screenshot’s ID.

Newly uploaded screenshots can be retrieved with this endpoint and must first be associated with a closed clash group.

https://forge.autodesk.com/en/docs/bim360/v1/reference/http/mc-index-service-v1-query-model-set-version-index-manifest-GET/

Gets the index manifest for a given model set version.

https://forge.autodesk.com/en/docs/bim360/v1/reference/http/mc-index-service-v1-query-model-set-version-index-fields-GET/

Gets information about a given model set version’s index field resource.

In the  response, click url to open another tab of endpoint, click [Send] to download the contents of the file. large file, better download as file

https://forge.autodesk.com/en/docs/bim360/v1/reference/http/mc-index-service-v1-query-model-set-version-index-POST/

Query a model set version index using the given statement property in the request body.

1, input the S3 statement for querying.
2. a job will be posted and the id will be set to [jobId]. Use [GET modelsets/:modelSetId/jobs/:jobId] to check the status

https://forge.autodesk.com/en/docs/bim360/v1/reference/http/mc-index-service-v1-get-model-set-job-GET/

Retrieves information about a given index view job, this endpoint can be used to track the progress of index view jobs.

If it succeeds, in the response, click url to open another tab of endpoint, click [Send] to download the contents of the file. large file, better download as file
